content.rendered:
Fulfill your potential with Regent College London

We are bringing the education from different UK universities to your doorstep

I want to study

Select Option
Business & Enterprise Allied Health Computing & AI

Not sure where to start?

Search for your course

The Regent College London Campus – Our Locations

Central London Harrow Kingsbury Southall Wembley

Our Locations

Our Regent College London campus has five locations across the capital. Our buildings were handpicked for suitability and ease of accessibility and transformed into what they have become today; boasting modern facilities, smart and cutting-edge technology and of course, excellent members of staff who are always on hand to provide care and support to students!

Central London

Our Central London College Campus is situated on Great Titchfield Street and surrounded by the best lunch spots, global businesses and breathtaking architecture. By choosing to study at our London Campus, you’ll be in awe of its surroundings on a daily basis, finding gems of London around every corner you turn.

Schools:

School of Computing and AI, School of Business and Enterprise, School of Allied Health

Course Types:

Higher National Diplomas, Foundation Year Routes, Foundation Degrees, Bachelors Degrees, Top Up Degrees, Masters Degrees

Read More

Harrow

Our Harrow campus boasts modern classrooms, IT labs and state-of-the-art facilities designed for educational progression. Just a few minutes’ walk from Rayners Lane tube station and with a host of amenities on its doorstep, the location is ideal for students who enjoy having everything close at hand.

Schools:

School of Computing and AI, School of Business and Enterprise, School of Allied Health

Course Types:

Higher National Diplomas, Foundation Year Routes, Foundation Degrees, Bachelors Degrees, Top Up Degrees

Read More

Kingsbury

The Regent College London Kingsbury campus is located on Valley Drive and is home to modern facilities within an incredibly vibrant area in North West London. With a dedicated Higher Education student suite, lounge area and IT lab, the campus provides a learning environment that is both academically and socially engaging.

Schools:

School of Business and Enterprise, School of Allied Health

Course Types:

Foundation Year Routes, Bachelors Degrees, Top Up Degrees

Read More

Southall

The Southall Campus is located on Southall High Street and in one of west London’s most diverse areas. Our Southall campus is based in a thriving community full of street food stalls, music venues and local businesses.

Schools:

School of Computing and AI, School of Business and Enterprise, School of Allied Health

Course Types:

Higher National Diplomas, Foundation Year Routes, Foundation Degrees, Bachelors Degrees, Top Up Degrees

Read More

Wembley

Based on London Road, The Regent College London; Wembley Campus is just a few minutes’ walk away from the iconic Wembley Stadium, world-famous SSE Wembley Arena, lunch hotspot Boxpark Wembley and bustling London Designer Outlet.

Schools:

School of Business and Enterprise

Course Types:

Higher National Diplomas, Foundation Degrees

Read More

About Us

The Regent Effect

Regent College London is a leading provider of industry-related higher education. We are a diverse community active in promoting learning and education, with an established record of success rates within UK Higher Education. You will experience an exciting time of study and interaction within an environment geared to draw the best from students, supported by a dedicated team of professionals at all levels who always put students first!

  • Higher National diplomas (HNDs), Foundation Year Routes, Foundation Degrees, Bachelor’s Degrees, Top-Up Degrees and Masters Degrees
  • Five London Campus locations
  • Day, Evening and Weekend Classes
  • Student Loans Offered
  • Thinking into Character (TiC): A suite of free transformational learning programmes
Find out More

How to Apply?

Mature Students and Returning to Education

University Partnerships

Student Advice Hub

What our students say

Raffaele Scotti

BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

With eye opening modules and challenging assignments, the course cannot get any more exciting. Floating through Business & Management foundation year, I developed an addiction to knowledge and a lust to proficiency. Thanks to the amazing lessons undertaken by the extremely professional and resourceful lecturers, I was able to discover a passion in Business. With an inclusive reputation the College offers everyone a variety of opportunities to be part in different societies available.

During Covid the staff were enormously supportive, making sure we did not suffer the absence of physical classes by providing  entertaining online classes as well as working closely with the pupil to ensure a maximum learning experience. I highly recommend Regent College to anyone seeking to return to education.

Bela Bogacs

BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

Regent College for me is the Temple of Mind. It is my contract for my future. Regent is a family, where you belong, you feel supported, respected, appreciated, valued. Your opinion matters and you are listened to. It gives you the tools to prepare and be ready to climb the HILL, to create and elevate to achieve your goals and dreams.

 

Adrian Chohan

MSc International Management

It is a multicultural college in a diverse, friendly, and vibrant city, that suits everyone. The course is extremely interesting with exciting modules of ‘International marketing’ and ‘Business development’. The diversity of modules really broadened my thinking. The projects and assignments we are doing have taught me a lot about business as a whole – not just in theory, but also in practice. The lectures are engaging and intriguing, delivered by excellent lecturers, have made my journey, educational, informative and life changing.

The staff are extremely supportive and are always trying to improve the student experience. They work effectively, to maintain an extremely efficient support mechanism which expands on their great customer/student service excellence. I strongly recommend Regent to future alumni and any of my immediate family who decide to return to academia.

Stacy Ann Buchanan

BSc (Hons) in Health and Social Care with Foundation Year (UOB)

As an adult student Regent College has afforded me the ideal environment to further my studies. It has constantly supported me both mentally and academically and has encouraged and inspired my own personal growth. Being a student here has presented numerous opportunities for me to become involved in the school’s lively community and this experience has enhanced my leadership potential. This College provided exceptional assistance and other necessary services to ensure that I am achieving the best possible results. Overall, Regent College has become my home away from home and a place for me to become a great success.

Patience Prosper

BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care (UOB)

I thoroughly enjoy being a student at Regent College. As a mature student, I know that this is the right place for me because I have received immense and timely support from the day I made contact with the college and this has continued throughout. The college does not only focus on the student’s academic success but also provides services to ensure your mental well-being is not compromised. The lectures are interactive and you’re encouraged to take leadership for your own learning. Since joining Regent I can see a huge difference in my approach to learning and that’s given me confidence. There has been huge support since we moved to virtual lectures. The lecturers are constantly reminding students that they can be contacted by email or on MS Teams if we need any support with any aspect of our degree.

Gianina-Madlena Patrascanu

BA (Hons) Marketing with Foundation Year

Regent College London has this amazing partnership with the Bucks New University, providing you opportunities for your future. It is a very nice environment with lovely students and lovely staff, always happy and ready to help you improve your academic journey. They will give you support and assistance whenever you are in need. I would definitely recommend this institute, if someone is looking for a bachelor degree education. You will feel accepted and supported in this college.

Radostina Todorova Dimitrova

BA (Hons) Business Management

My overall experience has been fantastic! I’ve made a great group of friends. My class size is small and we have a laugh with the tutors. The lessons are completely related to the job you want to do, and the course has made me rethink on what career I want because it leads you to many high paying jobs! I’ve learnt laws, legislation and skills that will benefit me in my career and its only my first year here! During the coronavirus, teaching has continued and tutors have been in regular contact to make sure I’m OK and to check if I need help. They’ve even worked out of hours to provide one to one support to get me through assignments! They’ve really gone above and beyond!

Neima Abdi Daher

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

Regent College London is an outstanding institution where you can approach tutors easily and find lots of support from staff if needed. I’ve being studying at the Regent College for 3 years now, their location access is what attracted me the most from where I live. It’s so multicultural that everyone can fit in comfortably.

Prakash Mandalia

BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

Rashed Haider

BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

Winsome Reid

HND

I think the course so far has exceeded my expectations, the teachers really do explain things well. If I don’t understand something, I know that I can go to any of my teachers and they will be able to break it down to me and offer me the additional support that I need. The best part of the course so far has been meeting like minded people, the teaching and, of course, the content of the course. I really enjoy learning about the different components of business and how businesses function optimally to generate revenue. I would definitely recommend the course and encourage anyone interested in business to go forward and study a HND with Regent College London.

 

Csilla Raduly

HND

I choose Regent College to study because it was recommended to me by a friend, who attends here. Enrolling and starting studying went very smoothly. I am very happy I got the chance to take the HND Business class, as my plan for the future is to run my own business. I am looking forward to making the best of this class and continue my studies to get my Bachelors Degree. Regent College offers great teachers, kind and polite. It also brought new friends, which I am grateful for.
